text: Mardik Tchaparian (; ; also spelled Mardek Chabarian) is a Lebanese former footballer who played as a striker. Active during the 1950s and 1960s, he used to play as a striker for Homenmen at club level. He was the top scorer in the 1960–61 Lebanese Premier League, scoring 15 goals during the season.
